                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                3.41.275.2                                                            (01-01-2004) Operating System                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              This section provides information about the SCRIPS                                                          operating system.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       3.41.275.2.1                                                               (01-01-2004) Overview                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         The operating system environment consists of the                                                             hardware and software that make up SCRIPS. This equipment consists of five                                                             functional subsystems that include:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           Character Recognition and Image Capture                                                                                                                                                                                                       Image Processing                                                                                                                                                                                                       System Control and Data Management                                                                                                                                                                                                       Character Recognition                                                                                                                                                                                                       Storage                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     3.41.275.2.2                                                               (01-01-2004) Character Recognition and Image Capture                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         The Character Recognition and Image Capture subsystem                                                             consists of up to three Scan-Optics 9000mm Series scanners that can operate                                                             independently of each other. The Series 9000mm is an Imaging and Intelligent                                                             Character Recognition (IICR) page and document scanner.  See                                                                   Figure 3.41.275-1.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Figure 3.41.275 -1                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   This image is too large to be displayed in the current screen.                                                                         Please click the link to view the image.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             As each document travels through the scanner transport                                                             bed, the scanner performs the following functions:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           A bleached image of the document is captured. This                                                                      is an image in which any drop-out ink is filtered so that only printed or                                                                      handwritten data is captured.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Character Recognition (CR) is performed.                                                                                                                                                                                                       The Document Locator Number (DLN) or Sequence Number                                                                      (SN) is printed in the proper place on the document by an inkjet printer unless                                                                      the document has already been numbered outside of SCRIPS.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A true and complete image is captured including                                                                      the DLN or SN. The drop-out ink is not filtered so the image is a true representation                                                                      of the document.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          The documents are then directed to one of the two-pocket                                                                      stackers or the reject pocket.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A monitor, keyboard, and print capability provide                                                                      an interface between the scanner and the operator.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          The scanner system displays messages on the Operator                                                                      Console screen and the Scanner Operator can enter commands through the keyboard.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                The scanner system also displays the Peripheral                                                                      Server Window and the Scan Optics Viewer window on the Operator Console screen.                                                                      In order to tell which window is currently active on the Operator Console                                                                      screen, look at the title bar. The title bar of the acitve window will be                                                                      blue and the title bar of the other windows will be gray.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        3.41.275.2.2.1                                                                  (01-01-2004) Peripheral Server Software                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Although SCRIPS no longer has a Peripheral Server                                                                Monitor, the peripheral server functions are now provided via software. This                                                                software directs the scanned image files from the Scanner to the Image Controller                                                                (IC) and is an integral part of the run-to-run balancing process, which is                                                                used on SCRIPS to track documents as they move through the system.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The system status and error messages that were                                                                previously displayed on the Peripheral Server Monitor are now displayed in                                                                the Peripheral Server Window on the Operator Console.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                3.41.275.2.2.2                                                                  (01-01-2004) Jam Assist Software                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    The Jam Assist Software temporarily stores images                                                                of documents when a jam condition occurs.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The Bleached images (if they are available) of                                                                each document that needs to be hand-dropped due to the jam will be displayed                                                                in the Scan Optics Viewer Window on the Operator Console via the jam assist                                                                software.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                3.41.275.2.3                                                               (01-01-2004) Image Processing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         The Image Processing subsystem consists of three                                                             Image Controllers and their associated multiple disk drives. Each Image Controller                                                             and its associated disk drives is called an IC.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      There is one IC connected to each scanner.                                                                                                                                                                            The IC performs operational functions for the                                                             9000mm Series Scanner such as the following:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           Run-To-Run Balancing document tracking                                                                                                                                                                                                       Batch and form controls                                                                                                                                                                                                       System and status/error checking                                                                                                                                                                                                       Transmission of image files to the Multiprocessor                                                                      Server                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Transmission of log files to the Multiprocessor                                                                      Server                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        3.41.275.2.3.1                                                                  (01-01-2004) IC Set Up                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    There is a 19 inch monitor and keyboard attached                                                                to the Image Controller that provides an interface between the scanner and                                                                the operator.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The connection between the IC and the Scanner                                                                and Server is controlled on the IC. The procedures for making these connections                                                                are given in Chapter 16 of the System Administrator Handbook.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  All three ICs are able to be connected to the                                                                server simultaneously.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                3.41.275.2.3.2                                                                  (01-01-2004) IC Functions                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    The IC lifts image data into Form specific strips                                                                and transmits these, together with the CR data, to the Recognition Engines                                                                and then to the Multiprocessor Server.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The IC performs additional quality control of                                                                imaged documents and writes the images to its temporary disk storage to maintain                                                                data integrity and provide backup.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The IC disk drives can normally store more image                                                                files than can be scanned in one day. The maximum recommended image file storage                                                                capacity of an IC is listed below:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           Form                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Stored Images                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                FTD                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Approximately 500,000 image files, or                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              IRP                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Approximately 600,000 image files                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    The IC automatically synchronizes the processing                                                                of documents read by the scanner and processed by the Multiprocessor Server                                                                to ensure integrity of data.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The Scanner and IC operate as a single unit with                                                                automatic system monitoring and synchronization. The IC monitors the scanner                                                                and allows the scanner to operate independently of the Multiprocessor Server.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                3.41.275.2.4                                                               (01-01-2004) System Control and Data Management                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         The System Control and Data management subsystem                                                             performs the following:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           Receives images from the Image Controller and writes                                                                      them to the data base.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Manages the data base where the images and image                                                                      data are stored.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Manages DLN/SN assignment and tracking.                                                                                                                                                                                                       Automatically routes work to the workstations.                                                                                                                                                                                                       Automatically passes images which require character                                                                      recognition to the Recognition Engines.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        3.41.275.2.5                                                               (01-01-2004) Character Recognition                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         The Character Recognition is performed by the                                                             following:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           Recognition Engines to identify data.                                                                                                                                                                                                       Workstation Operators to identify those characters                                                                      not recognized by the Recognition Engines.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        3.41.275.2.6                                                               (01-01-2004) Archival Storage                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         The Archival Storage subsystem stores true and                                                             complete electronic images of all Federal Tax Deposit Forms and IRP Forms                                                             1096 with their associated envelopes on optical disk.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               3.41.275.3                                                            (01-01-2004) Scanner Operations                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              This section describes the SCRIPS scanner operations.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 3.41.275.3.1                                                               (01-01-2004) Scanner Parts                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         The scanner consists of the following:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Transport (conveyor belts)                                                                                                                                                                                                       Power Up Button                                                                                                                                                                                                       Bleached Image Camera                                                                                                                                                                                                       Document Feeder                                                                                                                                                                                                       Serializer                                                                                                                                                                                                       Archive Camera                                                                                                                                                                                                       Stacker Pockets                                                                                                                                                                                                       Reject Pocket                                                                                                                                                                                                       Main Control Panel (Transport Control Panel)                                                                                                                                                                                                       Stacker Control Panel                                                                                                                                                                                                       Red Conveyor Emergency Stop Button                                                                                                                                                                                                       Main Panel Switches                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     3.41.275.3.2                                                               (01-01-2004) Scanner Functions                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         The Scan-Optics 9000mm performs the following                                                             functions:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           Captures two pictures of the document (a bleached                                                                      image that is used for CR and a true and complete image that is used for further                                                                      processing such as DV, QR, Archive, etc.)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Prints an identifying number on the documents                                                                                                                                                                                                       Archives images                                                                                                                                                                                                       Performs Character Recognition                                                                                                                                                                                                       Transmits document images and data for further processing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Produces a list of errors                                                                                                                                                                                                       Provides error reports                                                                                                                                                                                                       Generates scanner reports at end of processing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     3.41.275.3.3                                                               (01-01-2004) Main Control Panel                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         The Main Control Panel  (See Figure                                                                   3.41.275-2) , also referred to as the                                                                   "Transport Control                                                             Panel"                                                                , is located next to the Document Feeder on the frame of the scanner,                                                             and contains the following:                                                                                                                                                                                   Figure 3.41.275 -2                                                                    3.41.275.3.4                                                               (01-01-2004) Stacker Control Panel                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         The Stacker Control Panel  (See                                                                   Figure 3.41.275-3)  contains the following switches to communicate conditions                                                             of the stacker pockets and the reject pocket to the operator:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 RUNOUT POCKET  - This switch lights up when there                                                                      are one or more documents in the Reject Pocket.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Bin 1  - When the light on this switch is on, it                                                                      means there are one or more documents in the bottom pocket of the two-pocket                                                                      stacker unit. When the light is flashing, the bottom pocket is full.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Bin 2  - When the light on this switch is on, it                                                                      means there are one or more documents in the top pocket of the two-pocket                                                                      stacker unit. When the light is flashing, the top pocket is full.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 ON/RESET  - This switch turns the conveyor on/off                                                                      for clearing documents when a jam occurs, resets the transport if an error                                                                      is encountered, and turns on the power supply that controls the mechanical                                                                      components of the transport or stackers.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Conveyor Stop Button  - A red mushroom shaped shut-off                                                                      switch used to power down the motors, vacuums and pocket select gates, etc.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             Figure 3.41.275 -3 message will be displayed                                                             on the bottom of the Operator Console that indicates which stacker pocket(s)                                                             are full and need to be emptied.                                                                                                                                                                                      Note:                                                               The color of the message will depend                                                                on whether the scanner is in                                                                      "Hand Drop"                                                                    or                                                                      "                                                                Feed Drop"                                                                    mode.                                                                                                                                   3.41.275.3.5                                                               (01-01-2004) Image Controller Preparation                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         Check the IC to determine if it is ready to accept                                                             scanned work and monitor it to ensure the work is moving through the IC into                                                             the database.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      The IC Main Window will be displayed on the monitor.                                                             If it is not, contact the SA.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      There are 4 major areas on the screen                                                                     (See Figure 3.41.275-4):                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Command area                                                                                                                                                                                                       Counter area                                                                                                                                                                                                       Indicator area                                                                                                                                                                                                       Log area                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         Figure 3.41.275 -4                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        This image is too large to be displayed in the current screen.                                                                         Please click the link to view the image.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Check to make sure the image controller is connected                                                             to the Scanner and the Server by verifying that the buttons/options in the                                                             Command Area say                                                                   "Scanner Disconnect"                                                                 and                                                                   "                                                             Server Disconnect"                                                                . If they say                                                                   "Scanner Connect"                                                                 and/or                                                                   "Server Connect"                                                                 place the mouse pointer over the button and                                                             click once to connect them.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Check the Indicator area to ensure the indicators                                                             for each process are green. The boxes should be green in color and have a                                                                   "G"                                                                 displayed on them. If any process indicator is anything                                                             other than green, contact the SA.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Periodically during scanning, the Counter area                                                             should be observed to ensure the counters are advancing. The counts in the                                                             Next to Scan, Next to Load, Next to Process, and Next to Send should be changing                                                             fairly rapidly. If you are scanning and the counts are not changing, contact                                                             the SA.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      If a message window appears on the IC monitor                                                             screen indicating a serious problem (i.e.; File Not Found, File is Missing),                                                             contact an SA or SSME immediately.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  3.41.275.3.6                                                               (01-01-2004) Scanner Operator Tasks                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         The Scanner Operator will use screen menus to                                                             perform the day to day functions while operating the transport.                3.41.275.3.7                                                               (01-01-2004) Reading/Updating the Scanner Communication Log                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         The Scanner Communication Log is updated by Scanner                                                             Operators to inform other operators about the scanners.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      The Scanner Operator must read and update the                                                             Scanner Communication Log for information on:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           How the scanners are running                                                                                                                                                                                                       How the ICs are draining                                                                                                                                                                                                       What type of documents were scanned on the previous                                                                      shift                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          What type of documents should be scanned on this                                                                      shift                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Any reoccurring error messages                                                                                                                                                                                                       Any other information relevant to the scanning operation                                                                                                                                               3.41.275.3.8                                                               (01-01-2004) Performing Maintenance/Housekeeping Checks                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         You should perform the following housekeeping                                                             and preventive maintenance at the beginning of the shift and on an as needed                                                             basis prior to running the scanner:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           Check for foreign objects (staples, register tapes,                                                                      page corners).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Clear area under the paper guides.                                                                                                                                                                                                       Clean glass and bars above the cameras with a soft,                                                                      dry, lint-free cloth.                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Note:                                                                        Do not                                                                         use paper towels, facial tissues, or napkins. These contain wood particles                                                                         and/or oils that can scratch or smear camera glass. Do not use detergent cleaning                                                                         agents.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Check for missing, broken, loose, or excessively                                                                      worn parts (light bulbs, transport belts, rollers, etc.).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Dust the scanner with the air gun.                                                                                                                                             Note:                                                                        Keep camera areas covered to avoid scratching.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         Clean the feed wheel. (Check with SSME for further                                                                      instructions.)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        3.41.275.3.8.1                                                                  (01-01-2004) Checking the Ink Supply                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    As part of the Maintenance/Housekeeping checks,                                                                check and replace serializer ink supply.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The inkjet bottle is located under the top cover                                                                on the scanner.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  To replace an ink bottle do the following:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             Unscrew and remove the old ink bottle.                                                                                                                                                                                                                Unpack a new bottle.                                                                                                                                                                                                                Remove the plastic seal.                                                                                                                                                                                                                Turn the bottle upside down and screw into place,                                                                         being careful not to squeeze the bottle.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Press the red square button near the ink bottle                                                                         to purge the serializer ink flow.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Wipe excess ink from the serializer with a clean,                                                                         dry, lint-free cloth.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     Note:                                                                  Do not use paper products.                                                                   The lint will clog the jets of the ink serializer.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             3.41.275.3.9                                                               (01-01-2004) Logging onto the Scanner Operator Console                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         You must log onto the Operator Console to access                                                             applications and jobs.                                                                                                                                                                                      Note:                                                               Make sure                                                                that the keyboard is  not  in caps lock mode.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       After the scanner has been powered up, the Warning                                                             window is displayed.
